short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will detect the phishing sites based on our Api

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Phishing is a kind of social Engineering attack where a middle ware person apart from the original site provider tries to steal the user data like login credentials and with that obtained data he tries to make money from it by selling it on dark web or if its a banking site directly stealing the money from the user itself. To avoid these we have developed a ml model that can determine whether URL is a phishing site or not. A ML model that was trained from the datasets taken from Kaggle and integrated with the extension to let you know when you visit the phishing site
